net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.event

Class ComponentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.event.ComponentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, ComponentListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DestroyApplicationOnClose, RemoveUITaskListener, UnregisterWorkspaceHandlerListener

    public class ComponentAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentListener
    Empty implementation of ComponentListener for easy extending.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

        Description copied from interface: ComponentListener

      • componentHidden

        public void componentHidden(ComponentEvent e)
        Does nothing. Invoked when the component has been made invisible. This does not necessarily match the value of the getVisible() result from the component object.
        Specified by:
        componentHidden in interface ComponentListener
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.
